channel.title: Home on MiniCurtains
channel.description: Recent content in Home on MiniCurtains

item.title: Chapter 1
item.description: They appeared at midnight. Three men in white suits with dark sunglasses which could hide a soul. Just pop! Out of thin air. The dim street lamp glowed as the men walked, more like glided up to the doorstep of number 12 Endworth Way. The middle one knocked. Silence. Then suddenly a trap door flung open and the three men fell, not even flinching. The people who lived in the surrounding houses were still.
